attributes.action: Make tackling car theft a priority, especially 4x4’s that are stolen for crime.
attributes.background: Thefts of 4x4s especially Land Rovers are at an all time high, the police don’t seem to take this seriously, they fail to realise that these are used for further criminal acts, so if the police took this seriously and gave more resources to this, they would prevent cash points etc being stolen.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the police. 

You could raise this issue with the Police and Crime Commissioner for your area, who is elected. You can find your PCC here:

http://www.apccs.police.uk/find-your-pcc/
